summary: Adds a crafting recipe to Madcat221\'s Battlemage Attire.
descriptionHtml:
--------------------------------------
Craftable Robed Steel Plate
--------------------------------------
Original mod here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10506


A simple mod that adds a recipe for the Vigilant armor created by Madcat221.

I had noticed there was no way to obtain the armor, unless you buy it directly from Faralda, or find it enchanted on a dead Vigilant of Stendarr. But all one would have to do is throw some robes over your armor. So, with one Mantled College Robe, and a Steel Plate cuirass, you can create your own.


--------------------
Requirements
--------------------


Steel Smithing perk
Madcat221\'s original meshes and textures, see link above.


------------
Versions-
------------

1.0- initial release


----------
Credits
----------
Madcat221
author: Peterkeller
